# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines

- Do not include or specify the current search time or date in any generated content or documentation. Focus on content relevant to Smart Cafe documentation and instructions only.

## Documentation Structure

- Use this repository as markdown documentation for Smart Cafe.
- Each folder must have a `README.md` with base information about the folder's purpose and contents. This ensures the README is shown on GitHub when opening the folder.
- At the end of each page, add a **References** section for easy navigation between related documentation pages.
- Maintain clear separation between business-oriented documentation (business flows, use cases) and architecture-oriented documentation (technical, system design).

## Diagrams

- Business documentation may include Mermaid diagrams to clarify use cases if they are not clear.
- Architecture documentation should include Mermaid diagrams to simplify and visualize technical concepts.

## Audience

- Business stakeholders should focus on business domain docs and flows.
- Developers should focus on architecture docs and technical details.

## License
- All documentation is released under the Apache 2.0 License.

## Style
- Use consistent markdown formatting for headings, lists, and code blocks.
- Write in clear, concise language suitable for both business and technical audiences.
- Use active voice and avoid jargon to ensure clarity.
- Use mermaid diagrams where appropriate to enhance understanding.
- Ensure all documentation is well-organized and easy to navigate.
- The documentation should follow markdownlint rules for quality and consistency.
